column4: can anyone help me get a .asx streaming audio file to stream? Im running streamtuner and it just dosn't seem to be cutting it?
also, as a complete newbie to linux what is the "best" media player to use (I'm using xmss and it seems ok but...)?
what's wrong with the included one?
you have Rhythmbox, for audio, and Totem, for audio/video, included. if they're there, it's probably because they're thought to be the easiest for newcomers
